discourse_list.title: Recap: 13th Op Community Governance Call January 17th

content.content: As always, I really enjoyed talking shop with my fellow gov nerds! Recording is here: Jan 17 Gov Call Recording Summary of discussion:   Voting wraps up Jan 18th for Special Voting Cycle #9b  Project nominations for Retro-PGF Round 2  open from Jan 17th to Jan 31 Season 3 Starts Jan 26th Retro-PGF 2 and Grants Season 3 Member submitted questions  Collective thoughts on the use of 2M self-delegated $OP by SNX ambassador.    image1080×712 75.1 KB   image1021×615 40.9 KB   image1293×734 94.4 KB   image1255×500 16.7 KB   image1325×521 29.7 KB
Thank you for sharing these informations
Awesome man. Thanks for sharing this.
follow and be great about OP Gov!
Great. Looking forward to more updates.

As much as I love the ample amount of information in weekly community calls it feels like sometimes there is not enough time to respond or add additional questions to each topic after it is discussed. The meetings are always so brief and when I want to respond to something or ask a question without opening my microphone it’s already too late because the discussion has moved onto the next topic already by the time I have finished writing my question in text form.
That is good feedback, making a mental note for the next call to slow it down a bit.  Any suggestions you might have?

Maybe a mid point during each topic for q & a discussion or just a brief recap of the topic to add an extra 60 seconds for folks to respond or chime in. It can be really difficult to wrap my head around the discussion and coming up with a question even when I am ready for it. The time spent waiting for people to respond may seem like forever but may help include extra added value for the conversation.
Wow it’s great.i hope this project will go…
Thanks m friend that so nice

discourse_list.title: Recap: 12th Op Community Governance Call January 19th

content.content: Thanks for coming everyone! Recording is here: Jan 10 Gov Call Recording.mp4 - Google Drive Summary of discussion:  First token-house upgrade vote coming for Bedrock!!  [Request for Comment] Protocol Upgrade Proposal Information What kind of info would you like to see in the proposal for network upgrades?  Security (audits, bug bounties) timeline and implementation details Why are we doing this upgrade? Potential community AMA? Stakeholders will need time to react to vote passing   Proposed template will be put on the forum later today! This is a big step for the token house & Optimism (get excited)     Question on incentivizing builders to build w/bedrock  We currently have two posts to gather grant idea requests for each sub-committee In the first week after voting cycle #9b, grant committees will put out their framework and can draw from these posts Contribute your ideas here:  Builders grants: Request for Grants: Builders Grants  Growth Experiments grants: Request for Grants: Growth Experiments      What if a grant committee member submits a proposal?  They can do this, but declare conflict in nomination & not vote   Questions about the types of projects to nominate for RPGF2  Round 2 is focused on things for the Optimism ecosystem specifically This will likely evolve as we get further into voting rounds We need to get to the point where Optimism & RPGF is self-sustaining now in order to do more good in the future    Next meeting will be next week! -Michael

discourse_list.title: Recap: 14th OP Community Governance Call January 31st

content.content: Hey Everyone! Recording for the meeting can be found here. Will update this post soon with a summary of discussion. Best, Michael

This was very enjoyable to attend, thanks everyone. It was only my second live attendance and third call that I had viewed. So I was very pleasantly surprised to witness the camaraderie, and friendly banter, between the attendees. This was a very positive reflection on a relatively new working group. While time zone differences make these calls hard to attend, the experience last week will motivate me for some more early starts that could ideally allow me to join in more frequently. Thanks Michael for organising, and thanks to all the participants.

Yes !! Always loving the governance calls and super bummed when I miss one. Keeping up with OP Gov is hard work. @Michael great job on stepping back during the conversation last meeting to make sure everyone had their questions answered. I am excited to see how the network grows this year with all of these amazing people involved.
Hi @Michael Just wondering if there will be a 15th Community Call this week. I haven’t seen (or can’t find!) a notice Post about it. Thanks for any advice and info. Cheers!
Hi @Axel_T, Yes there will be! Making the post right now, apologies for the delay.
You have nothing to apologise for, @Michael, I was just checking if I’d missed it. Cheers.
